email.register.subject: Register complete | Share-CV
email.register.headerText: You left an application for registration on the Share-CV website
email.register.bodyContent: To complete registration and activate your account - follow the link
email.register.bodyLinkExpiresText: The link will be available within 24 hours!
email.reset.subject: Password recovery | Share-CV
email.reset.headerText: You have requested password recovery on the Share-CV website
email.reset.bodyContent: To create a new password and activate your account - follow the link
email.reset.bodyLinkExpiresText: The link will be available within 24 hours!
usersAuth.notFound: User not found or has not been created yet
usersAuth.inactiveUser: The user is inactive. Please, confirm your email
usersAuth.userExist: User with this email already exists
usersAuth.sendRegisterEmail: An instruction on completing registration has been sent to your email
usersAuth.registered: Registration is complete, account is activated! To access the site, use your email and password
usersAuth.sendResetEmail: A link to confirm password reset has been sent to your email
usersAuth.recovered: Password changed successfully. To access the site, use your email and password
